languages.text: {n}Высокая женщина средних лет смотрит прямо перед собой с отсутствующим видом, потирая {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}имплант{/g} на виске. Ее воротник расстегнут, а одна застежка вот-вот отвалится. Почувствовав ваше присутствие, Идира поворачивает к вам голову и растягивает рот в кривой улыбке, однако ее взгляд устремлен сквозь вас.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Высокая женщина средних лет смотрит прямо перед собой с отсутствующим видом, потирая {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}имплант{/g} на виске. Ее воротник расстегнут, а одна застежка вот-вот отвалится. Почувствовав ваше присутствие, Идира поворачивает к вам голову и растягивает рот в кривой улыбке, однако ее взгляд устремлен сквозь вас.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The tall, middle-aged woman stares straight ahead, her eyes vacant, as she rubs the {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g} at her temple. Her collar is undone, and one of the clasps is on the verge of falling off. Sensing your presence, Idira turns her head toward you and offers you a crooked smile, even as her eyes look right through you.{/n}

languages.text: {n}这位身材高大的中年女性直视着前方，眼神空洞，揉着太阳穴上的{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}。她的衣领已经开了，其中一个扣子都快要掉下来了。伊迪拉感觉到了你的存在，向你转过了头，对你露出了扭曲的笑容，眼神仿佛要看穿你一样。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The tall, middle-aged woman stares straight ahead, her eyes vacant, as she rubs the {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g} at her temple. Her collar is undone, and one of the clasps is on the verge of falling off. Sensing your presence, Idira turns her head toward you and offers you a crooked smile, even as her eyes look right through you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这位身材高大的中年女性直视着前方，眼神空洞，揉着太阳穴上的{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}。她的衣领已经开了，其中一个扣子都快要掉下来了。伊迪拉感觉到了你的存在，向你转过了头，对你露出了扭曲的笑容，眼神仿佛要看穿你一样。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La mujer alta de mediana edad mira adelante con ojos ausentes mientras se frota el {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implante{/g} de su sien. Su ropa está arrugada y uno de los cierres de su cuello está a punto de caerse. Al sentir tu presencia, Idira gira la cabeza hacia ti y te ofrece una sonrisa torcida, aunque su mirada te atraviesa.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The tall, middle-aged woman stares straight ahead, her eyes vacant, as she rubs the {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g} at her temple. Her collar is undone, and one of the clasps is on the verge of falling off. Sensing your presence, Idira turns her head toward you and offers you a crooked smile, even as her eyes look right through you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La mujer alta de mediana edad mira adelante con ojos ausentes mientras se frota el {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implante{/g} de su sien. Su ropa está arrugada y uno de los cierres de su cuello está a punto de caerse. Al sentir tu presencia, Idira gira la cabeza hacia ti y te ofrece una sonrisa torcida, aunque su mirada te atraviesa.{/n}

languages.text: {n}背の高い、中年の女性は、こめかみの{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}インプラント{/g}をさすりながら、虚ろな目でまっすぐ前を見つめている。襟はほどけ、留め具のひとつが外れかけている。あなたの気配を察知したイディラは、こちらに顔を向け、あなたを見透かすような目つきで、歪んだ笑みを浮かべた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The tall, middle-aged woman stares straight ahead, her eyes vacant, as she rubs the {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g} at her temple. Her collar is undone, and one of the clasps is on the verge of falling off. Sensing your presence, Idira turns her head toward you and offers you a crooked smile, even as her eyes look right through you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}背の高い、中年の女性は、こめかみの{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}インプラント{/g}をさすりながら、虚ろな目でまっすぐ前を見つめている。襟はほどけ、留め具のひとつが外れかけている。あなたの気配を察知したイディラは、こちらに顔を向け、あなたを見透かすような目つきで、歪んだ笑みを浮かべた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die große Frau mittleren Alters blickt mit leerem Blick stur geradeaus und reibt sich das {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Implantat{/g} an ihrer Schläfe. Ihr Kragen ist geöffnet und eine der Schnallen droht jeden Augenblick abzufallen. Als Idira deine Anwesenheit spürt, dreht sie den Kopf zu dir und lächelt dich schief an. Ihre Augen blicken jedoch durch dich hindurch.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The tall, middle-aged woman stares straight ahead, her eyes vacant, as she rubs the {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g} at her temple. Her collar is undone, and one of the clasps is on the verge of falling off. Sensing your presence, Idira turns her head toward you and offers you a crooked smile, even as her eyes look right through you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die große Frau mittleren Alters blickt mit leerem Blick stur geradeaus und reibt sich das {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Implantat{/g} an ihrer Schläfe. Ihr Kragen ist geöffnet und eine der Schnallen droht jeden Augenblick abzufallen. Als Idira deine Anwesenheit spürt, dreht sie den Kopf zu dir und lächelt dich schief an. Ihre Augen blicken jedoch durch dich hindurch.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les yeux perdus dans le vague, la femme entre deux âges frotte son {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g} temporal. Son col est en partie défait et l'un des fermoirs semble d'ailleurs sur le point de se décrocher. Sentant votre présence, Idira tourne la tête dans votre direction et vous salue d'un sourire en coin, mais vous voyez bien que son regard inexpressif ne fait que vous traverser.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The tall, middle-aged woman stares straight ahead, her eyes vacant, as she rubs the {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g} at her temple. Her collar is undone, and one of the clasps is on the verge of falling off. Sensing your presence, Idira turns her head toward you and offers you a crooked smile, even as her eyes look right through you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les yeux perdus dans le vague, la femme entre deux âges frotte son {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g} temporal. Son col est en partie défait et l'un des fermoirs semble d'ailleurs sur le point de se décrocher. Sentant votre présence, Idira tourne la tête dans votre direction et vous salue d'un sourire en coin, mais vous voyez bien que son regard inexpressif ne fait que vous traverser.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Uzun boylu, orta yaşlı kadın; bir yandan şakağındaki {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implantı{/g} ovalarken bir yandan da gözlerini ileri dikmiş, boş boş bakıyor. Yakası çözülmüş ve kopçalarından biri düşmek üzere. Varlığını sezen İdira, başını sana doğru çeviriyor ve gözleri seni görmüyor olsa da çarpık bir gülümseme sunuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The tall, middle-aged woman stares straight ahead, her eyes vacant, as she rubs the {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g} at her temple. Her collar is undone, and one of the clasps is on the verge of falling off. Sensing your presence, Idira turns her head toward you and offers you a crooked smile, even as her eyes look right through you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Uzun boylu, orta yaşlı kadın bir yandan şakağındaki {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g}ı ovalarken bir yandan da gözlerini ileri dikmiş, boş boş bakıyor. Yakası çözülmüş ve kopçalarından biri düşmek üzere. Varlığını hisseden İdira, başını sana doğru çeviriyor ve gözleri seni görmüyor olsa da çarpık bir gülümseme sunuyor.{/n}
